short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Netwrix Privilege Secure's official web browser extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Netwrix Privileged Secure makes it easy to overcome the challenges and limitations of traditional PAM offerings and secure, control, manage, and monitor privileged account usage through a just-in-time, just-enough privilege approach.
